name: Snack Deviled Eggs
ingredients: Mustard (yellow, Dijon or spicy brown, etc.)
Dill or sugar free sweet pickle relish

instructions.en: Peel the hard boiled eggs and slice them in half lengthwise
instructions.sk: Olúpte vajcia natvrdo a pozdĺžne ich prekrojte na polovicu
instructions.ja: ゆで卵の殻をむき、縦半分に切る

instructions.en: Remove the yolks and place them in a bowl
instructions.sk: Vyberte žĺtky a vložte ich do misky
instructions.ja: 黄身を取り出してボウルに入れる

instructions.en: Combine yolks with mustard, mayonnaise, pickle relish, and seasonings to taste
instructions.sk: Zmiešajte žĺtky s horčicou, majonézou, nakladanou zeleninou a korením podľa chuti
instructions.ja: 黄身にマスタード、マヨネーズ、ピクルス、調味料を好みで加えて混ぜる

instructions.en: Beat or whisk the yolk mixture until smooth and creamy
instructions.sk: Vyšľahajte alebo vymiešajte zmes žĺtkov, až kým nebude hladká a krémová
instructions.ja: 黄身の混ぜ物を滑らかでクリーミーになるまで泡立てるか混ぜる

instructions.en: Spoon or pipe the yolk mixture into the egg white halves
instructions.sk: Naložte alebo vtlačte zmes žĺtkov do polovíc bielkov
instructions.ja: スプーンまたは絞り袋を使って、卵白の半分に黄身の混ぜ物を詰める

instructions.en: Sprinkle with paprika, Spicy Seasoning Salt and/or minced chives for garnish
instructions.sk: Posypte paprikou, pikantnou koreninovou soľou a/alebo nasekanými pažítkami na ozdobu
instructions.ja: パプリカ、スパイシーシーズニングソルト、刻んだチャイブをガーニッシュとして振りかける
